original_title: Intimissimi on Ice 2017: A Legend Of Beauty
overview: With over 80 million albums sold, Andrea Bocelli returns to cinemas to star in this feature-length special event ice show where opera, pop music, figure skating and fashion combine for this breath-taking performance, produced and filmed at the iconic Arena Di Verona in Italy.
title: Intimissimi on Ice 2017: A Legend Of Beauty
